test_name: DSHRTRPR compared to DSCHDASD, DSCHDVSD, DSCHDACD, DSCHDTOF, DSCHDOTH
short_desc: If DSCHDASD, DSCHDVSD, DSCHDACD, DSCHDTOF and DSCHDOTH = 0, DSHRTRPR should not = 1
full_desc: If Q3. DSCHDASD (CHD - atrial septal defect), Q4. DSCHDVSD (CHD - ventricular septal defect), Q5. DSCHDACD (CHD - AV canal defect), Q6. DSCHDTOF (CHD - tetralogy of Fallot) and Q7. DSCHDOTH (CHD - Other) = 0 (absent), Q37. DSHRTRPR (Major surgical procedure - Congenital heart defect repair) should not = 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If DSCHDASD, DSCHDVSD, DSCHDACD, DSCHDTOF and DSCHDOTH = 0 and DSHRTRPR = 1
comp_vars: DSHRTRPR, DSCHDASD, DSCHDVSD, DSCHDACD, DSCHDTOF, DSCHDOTH

test_name: DSTHYSRG compared to DSHYPOTH, DSHASHIM, DSHYPER
short_desc: If DSHYPOTH, DSHASHIM, and DSHYPER = 0, DSTHYSRG should not = 1
full_desc: If Q19. DSHYPOTH (Hypothyroidism), Q20. DSHASHIM (Hashimoto's thyroidosis), and Q21. DSHYPER (Hyperthyroidism) = 0 (Absent), Q42. DSTHYSRG (Thyroid surgery) should not = 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If DSHYPOTH, DSHASHIM, and DSHYPER = 0 and DSTHYSRG = 1

full_desc: If Q27. DSHRT (Has participant received HRT?) = 0 (No), Q28. DSAGEHRT (At what age did HRT begin?) should = 888, 999
test_logic: If DSHRT = 0 and DSAGEHRT not in (888, 999)

full_desc: If Q24. DSMENSTR (Has participant ever menstruated?) = 2 (Yes, menopausal), Q26. DSMNPAGE (Age of onset of menopause) should = 20-65 or 999 (Valid age values for this question)
test_logic: If DSMENSTR = 2 and DSMNPAGE ne 20-65 or 999

full_desc: If Q27. DSHRT (Has participant received HRT?) = 0 (No), Q29. DSYRSHRT (how many years has the participant been on HRT?) should = 9
